website_summaries.verdict: A very good, fully loaded compact megazoom, the Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS7 offers a lot of shooting flexibility and a built-in GPS.
pros: Lots of features to experiment with

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for carry, takes pretty good pictures for a point and shoot and has excellent optical zoom capabilities. Camera itself was somewhat bulky so it couldn't really fit into a pocket. Instead I got a camera pouch to put it in to protect the camera and then it went into a backpack to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Hung Sewell

customer_reviews.title: A Complete Dependable Camera
customer_reviews.text: We already had this digital camera for the last 4 months. We like almost everything on this product, easy to use, nice to hold on your hands, great picture quality, and most of all is the HD video feature which is awesome!...results were smooth, vivid colors, cristal clear and you can zoom it with full auto focus (we had our last 2 digital Sony cameras with not so great video capability). This camera is also loaded with features like the GPS tagging that I'm still not very familiar with. Otherwise, this is a complete all you need digital point & shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: Snellville Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it ....
customer_reviews.text: It's our little "go to" pocket camera. It gets nice sharp photos without carrying around a massive professional looking camera.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia K.

customer_reviews.title: am loving loving lumix
customer_reviews.text: Still Learning to use, the zoom helped me get my grandson at his new job, the feature that follows your subject around allowed me to keep track of him as he was jumping from one place to another This was at a very hectic grand opening in a very crowded store... I even put my pics on my facebook page... I am still in the learning process because my old camera was really old. I purchased this one on top of another but this one makes the other camera look like a toy. Great value.. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Kulka

customer_reviews.title: awesome job
customer_reviews.text: This camera is wonderful. I had a two Cannon Powershots before the older one took forever to take a picture, the second one went through batteries every 5 pictures which is not that much of an exaggeration! This camera is wonderful. The battery holds a charge, the pictures are beautiful, and it takes the pictures in rapid succession. I am very pleased. All the reviews I read on this camera hold true. It is a nice point and shoot with professional quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Lumix DMC-ZS7 camera after reading reviews & am not disappointed. I am not a professional photographer but my pictures are awesome! The camera has a lot of features that I am still learning, but auto intelligence is for me! I did have trouble downloading video to my PC, but found after using Panasonic's software it was fine. I love the fact I can see the LCD screen in bright daylight,a feature my old Kodak could not do.
customer_reviews.author: SMG

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for a novice
customer_reviews.text: I am not a photo expert so please know that this review comes from a novice. The camera delivers wonderful pictures and has impressed with its zoom. It is a fairly rugged product and has given us issue-free performance. I have had some issues trying to figure out the GPS function, but the issue is likely due to my ignorance of the feature. A very good camera with great HD video.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: great compact camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera before our trip to Hawaii. Has a great zoom pictures was able to take pictures of birds and waterfalls that were very far away and the pics turned out great. Only thing it does not have which I would have preferred is an independent viewer since when the sun is bright it is hard to see the LCD screen Other than that love it and would definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Takes AMAZING photos
customer_reviews.text: I had the previous version of this camera but my LCD screen shattered on the inside after just 6 months and it is not warrantied. I baby my cameras and always keep them in a case, so I'm not sure how it could have even happened. I was NOT happy that my $379 camera needed a $160 new screen after just 6 months! However, the camera took such amazing photos, I bought this new version anyway. LOVE IT! Everyone comments on what great photos it takes, so hopefully my screen will last years this time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic camera
customer_reviews.text: Second panasonic camera of this type I have purchased because the first one was lost. This camera is just as good as the first takes great photos and is easy to use. I compare the quality of the images to my Canon 50D. The reason I bought it was because I wanted a small camera with a good zoom that would focus quickly to avoid that lag that so many point and shoots have. Totally happy with my purchase and would do it again without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: geno

customer_reviews.title: A fun "spy camera"
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a lot of fun to use, especially for "older" eyesight. You can zoom in on birds, buildings, etc and see much more detail than with normal vision. My only complaint is that the camera usage booklet needs to be downloaded and printed from your computer. Would be much nicer to actually have a little compact booklet.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Little Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first Lumix in 2007 for a medical mission to Peru, then took it to Uganda. I've since purchased two more for family. What a little workhorse. I'ts been tumbled in the back on trucks, ground in the dirt (accidently), and still takes fabulous pictures. This new model is even nicer, with better zoom and the wide angle seems to be better. Last took this model to SE Asia and it handled the humidity just fine. Also, rarely get red-eye. Best buy for a point-and-shoot. Also took pretty good videos.
customer_reviews.author: justsayhey55

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: this is a great quality camera in a small package. my husband uses it for taking pictures at work for defects in furniture and it gets close enough to see those small defects. its a great camera
customer_reviews.author: Elaina Pitre

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic ZS7
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Takes superb photos, is easy to use and has many controls to be creative. I use the camera quite a bit for hiking and snow skiing. It fits into the pocket well. I love the high powered zoom and the large bright screen. Easy to see even in outdoors. Battery life seems to be normal so I purchase a 2nd battery as a backup. Outstanding camera for around $260. I have not used the GPS, so I cannot comment on this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Great camera - Not shirt pocket size
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. The telephoto aspects of this camera are a huge plus. I can lock into my kids face during a school graduation 75 feet away with full HD video clarity. I love the GPS feature. It actually works well around the country. The picture quality is typical. Slow moving good light are excellent. Of course quality drops proportional subject motion and lighting. Overall very good camera - The lens is everything on this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Horace'sWorld

customer_reviews.title: Great bit of Gear
customer_reviews.text: I found this camera excellent particularly the GPS function once it is set up. The pictures are fantastic and clear whether the subject is still or moving.
customer_reviews.author: Bigga

customer_reviews.title: Little Red Camera
customer_reviews.text: So many settings but when set right, it takes great pics. I found no problem in low light as long as the white setting was done first.
customer_reviews.author: The Wizard

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this little camera.and gives it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this little camera and Love it. It replaced my FX-100S and what I love about it is that 16-1 Power Zoom, so clear and crispy plus the most important is the Zoom while using the video part while the others don't have this option. I also ordered a Travel Kit from Unigue's with TWO spare battery's and travel charger, cases, film screen protectors for only $29. The battery's are the Correct ones with the electronic memory for that camera. Best camera yet for me and I have had LOT'S of camera'a.......
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Richard J. Harper Jr.

customer_reviews.title: DC Converter Not Available!
customer_reviews.text: I love to use this camera, but after buying it last May, I discovered that one essential part that goes with the AC Adapter is not available, and the AC Adapter cannot be used without it! I refer to the DC Converter. I have called the Panasonic Parts store regularly, but they just tell me that the part is under review for pricing. I am really disappointed in Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: D. Isburgh

customer_reviews.title: A worthy replacement for my Canon 850IS
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today ... Delivery was fast. Never expected that the box package would be smaller than my previous Canon 850IS bought 3 years ago. For the price I got for it, I know it was a bargain. Even now, I await the release of the Lumix FZ100 (although I may wait a while before ordering it, want to see the reviews of others first)
customer_reviews.author: Wong Kuan Suan

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. I use mostly for recording videos at ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. I use mostly for recording videos at concerts. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jana M.

customer_reviews.title: photofunstudio can't find videos
customer_reviews.text: i need answers about why photofunstudio, software which came with the camera, cannot find videos on my sdhc card. i can play the videos if the card is in the camera, and i can get to pictures when i use the software. but the software can't find the videos. and i cannot find anyone to contact to help me solve the problem. no phone numbers, no email, just faq's about a few unrelated things. update: i did finally sift through the web site enough to find a phone number. long wait, as usual, and the technician eventually told me to uninstall and reinstall the software. no change. real helpful.
customer_reviews.author: David E.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Pictures
customer_reviews.text: It takes awesome pictures very user friendly easy to use! Would definitely recommend it to all my friends! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Carlock

customer_reviews.title: Lighter and better
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit slimmer than the previous model, and also a little lighter. The GPS feature would drain your battery ultra fast. Not really a great feature, because if you do not remember where you took a picture, it is because the place was not that memorable. The video quality is very good and for concerts the stereo sound is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Romero

customer_reviews.title: nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something relatively small with a superzoom feature. This is only a little bigger than a pocket 3x zoom but has 12x zoom which works great! the newer version is even better with a 14 or 16 x zoom. The pictures are very good and all the automatic modes work well. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: droth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little point and shoot. Lot's of options and great quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Franky

customer_reviews.title: The best camera in it's category!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It is easy to use, and produces top quality pictures. I highly recommend this camera to anyone wanting a simple to use semi compact camera. I have taken video with this camera which I was amazed at how good it came out. This camera will not disappoint! It is well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth H. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, just wish my HP keyboard worked as well. I added the water proof case and have taken it everywhere and put it through the wringer and it keeps working. I would buy another one tomorrow if I lost this one.
customer_reviews.author: Onebeachbumm

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix DMZ-ZS7  "System Error (Focus) "
customer_reviews.text: I too have had the same issue! "System Error (Focus) " Too bad, I loved this camera for the the brief time it was working properly. The dealings with the service department would yield a whole other posting. Aside from being very protective of my cameras and taking exceptional care of them, this particular camera ( Panasonic DMC-ZS7 ) only had about 100 photos taken with it. For a digital camera, that's less than a days worth of usage for most. Being a retired professional photographer and being asked for opinions and advice on a daily basis I'll being recommending folks to avoid Panasonic products. Anyhoo, I'll not own or purchase another Panasonic item EVER! Regards, Dave
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got me this camera after he researched Consumer Reports because he was tired of me griping about missing action shots due to the lag time on my old camera. An amazing camera for the price. Can't believe how awesome it takes action photos and it has the burst feature so I can take a bunch of shots in a row and not miss anything. It has a lot of features that I'm still learning to use. Thankfully, my 12 year old daughter is a whiz and just gives me that "duh Mom" look while she shows me what to do!
customer_reviews.author: Debra E. Perini

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome. It takes great pictures and is easy to use. I highly recommend it to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: cold in the dakotas

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS7
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pictures. Many features which can be daunting to my generation, but a great camera. Just wish a printed version of the full instructions was avaiable and not have to be printed from the CD. I would purchase this camera again.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for concerts!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Muse concerts. Takes incredible close ups from a distance and great picture/movie quality with the light show and night time concert venue. Awesome purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Detmore

customer_reviews.title: fabulous panasonic camera
customer_reviews.text: fabulous camera-always had canon cameras-but always wanted leica lens-and the best part is the gps-just returned from antigua with some beautiful photos (450)!!
customer_reviews.author: cindys

customer_reviews.title: Lots of great features in a small package
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for the long zoom. It's all it was promised to be and more! love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Quilts in GA

customer_reviews.title: One of the best compact camera.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a compact camera with decent video recording, this is one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: J. hui

customer_reviews.title: Great camera when it works...
customer_reviews.text: Picked it up from Amazon almost three months ago. The camera is great when it works. Low light not as good as it could be but not a big problem for me. HD video looks great. After about 5 weeks it stopped recognizing SD cards (tried four different cards). Got the replacement from Panasonic and same problem after only three weeks of use. I am waiting for my second replacement hopefully it will work. I've been using Panasonic cameras over the last few years and they were always very solid but this one is changing my view of the company. It will probably be the last Panasonic I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this camera about a year or maybe a year and a half now. Its a great little camera! Did real well on videos at a recent graduation and fits well in a pocket or a purse. We've been very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: great photos....fragile unit. Got dust inside lens in less then 2 weeks and stopped focusing. Paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Little Goat Services LLC

customer_reviews.title: waynes  review
customer_reviews.text: The camera was everything that Panasonic said it was. Great crisp clear images and looking fwd to learning more about the manual controls to become more creative.
customer_reviews.author: yaksta

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic ZS-7
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing camera, all my friends want it too, it's handy, easy to pack and has big quality for its size! Little minor thing is the GPS functionality, it's slow. But as a gadget it's fun!
customer_reviews.author: Johan Smits

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have the previous model and I love it so I bought this newer model for my mom for her birthday. I would like to trade her cameras now. It's awesome! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

product_meta.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS7 12.1 MP Digital Camera with 12x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Red)
feature_bullets: Built-in GPS function lets you keep track of your photos by location
